text: Thanks for working so late today.

... Lately, there's been so many jobs piling up.
Sorry for keeping you so busy.
Even though L'Antica's live is so soon...

If work ever gets to to rough, don't hesitate to tell me.
I'll do my best to adjust your schedule.

If it ever comes to the point where I can't fit it all in,
I'll just half-heartedly figure something out.

Half-heartedly... No, that won't work. Yeah, I definitely 
need to keep a closer eye on your schedule...!
And just when I thought I'd be able to skip a few lessons.
